name: Clarion Collection Hotel Temperance

reviews.text: This hotel is nestled right in the middle of 'downtown' Malmo, although there is not a great deal of things happening in Malmo
reviews.title: Trendy but very small rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was clean and trendy but at the same time very basic and the rooms were very small. I think there is plenty of better choices but at the same time it is a safe bet. It will not leave a huge impression I believe, but it is still nicely located in the nice area of malmo
reviews.title: Wow, what food

reviews.text: Our stay at the Temperance was great in every respect. But the food was the highlight. There was a breakfast buffet with several hot choices, plus a complete selection of cold cuts, cheeses, breads and condiments. Variety from day to day was good, including fresh squeezed orange juice, waffles, and egg choices.
reviews.title: Good base for Business trips

reviews.text: The free "light evening lunch" that was mentioned on the website for the hotel turned out to be a buffet of meat hotdish, vegetables, several salads, breads and cheeses, and a delicious dessert.
reviews.title: Man_Norrland

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also available all day in the bar area was fresh fruit and coffee/tea. At 3 pm they also served a warm-from-the-oven cake.
reviews.title: Very high value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this online and the room looked okay and had rec'd some good comments. However what we rec'd is not the photo of the room we saw online. Our room was opposite the elevator in the older/refurbished section. The room was small...about 12 x 13 ft and there is only one desk chair to sit in. So one of us had to lie on the bed at all times. The headboard takes up the entire wall. No luggage rack, so we stacked them atop one another on the floor. The towel heater in bath didn't work. If you like shampoo, bring your own as the soap is from a liquid dispenser. The room is clean and I am not one to ask to be moved once I've been given a room---I just write a review of my experience. If you stay here and need parking, make sure you reserve a space as I think there are about 8 spaces in their garage. Also, make sure you have an up to date GPS or specific driving directions from the hotel as it is tricky to find because of one way streets and barricades. Dinner / breakfast were adequate. Front desk staff friendly and helpful and hotel is convenient in a good location for walking.
reviews.title: Not What We Thought We Were Getting...

reviews.text: This is the fourth time I staid in the Clarion in Malmö and normally it is great. Beautiful rooms, at least until this time. This time I was put in the older part (refurbished part) of the hotel, which is really not very nice. I had a single room, which looked like a student dorm. The view on this side is also not great, the walls are thin (noisy). Such a world of difference with the other, newer part of the hotel. I would definitely recommend staying here, but choose a double room in the new part of the hotel!
reviews.title: Great hotel, if you have a double room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is great, just of Lille Torg (authentic square with restaurants and bars), and on walking distance of the central station, so you can take the train to Kopenhagen Airport/Kastrup.
reviews.title: Great Surprise

reviews.text: The breakfast is good, has the typical Swedish selection, as well as cereals, fruit, good coffee, fresh orange juice.
reviews.title: Short stay in beautiful Malmo

reviews.text: Cleanliness is not always great. Last time stepped into glass in the bathroom!
reviews.title: Nici Hotel, Nice price

reviews.text: Simple basic, clean hotel. Rooms were small and I have trouble with hotels that provide business users with rooms that are not big enough to have a wardrobe in them. A wall frame with four hangers really isn't good enough for a weeks business stay where you need to hang suits and shirts. Good wifi internet connection. Not bad but I preferred the Best Western for room size and proper wardrobe.
reviews.title: Basic No Frills Hotel

reviews.text: As always in Clarion hotels the service was impeccable. Very friendly and helpful staff. My single room felt a bit too small at the price I paid but was nice with a very comfy bed. Breakfast was very good. Location in the city was very good with plenty of restaurants and pubs nearby.
reviews.title: As always in Clarion hotels the service...

reviews.text: I have stayed at Choice hotels before in Sandefjord (top class) and Copenhagen (ok) but this was a top class experience. My son and I were in Malmo to experience Swedish football (it was a brilliant occasion). We turned up at 11am to be told it was a 3pm check in. But the kindly receptionist managed to find us a room that was ready, if we didn't mind a view into the lobby and a window that wouldn't open. Brilliant job. Room spotless, small shower /toilet area but so what. It was ideal for us as we were only going to be laying our head down.
reviews.title: Great hotel, ideal location.

reviews.text: The hotel was pristine and there were free cakes and tea and coffee plus fruit if you wanted them. Sweden is expensive so it was brilliant that there was also a free buffet at night, serving fish, stroganoff and some kind of pie. There were salads, pasta and other things too. We gave it a miss and went to a pizza place to enjoy the local atmosphere at Lilla Torg square. The hotel was quiet, we slept well. Next morning there was a huge spread of foods for breakfast, a comprehensive a buffet, and no shortage of it. Our stay was short but the hotel was exceptional value and we felt the staff couldn't do enough for us. The location in a quiet street is superb, and about 200 yards from the quaint Lilla Torg Square, a few minutes from other key squares and shopping and about seven minutes to Malmo Central station.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in the city center of Malmö

reviews.text: Where ever I go I will always seek out a Choice hotel first. If anyone wants info on how to see Malmo play in the Swedish league etc, email me for some tips.
reviews.title: free food!!!

reviews.text: All fine, nice room, comfortable details and kind staff.
reviews.title: Fine, clean, scandinavian good hospitality.

reviews.text: nice, clean, large rooms (if you opt for a superior room; which i do suggest).
reviews.title: best value in Malmö!

reviews.text: service with a smile, especially at front desk.
reviews.title: Clean, large rooms and good value

reviews.text: and above all: quality of the (free!) food (breakfast and evening meal) is in my opinion (i have visited quite a few clarion collection hotels) is about the BEST you will ever find.
reviews.title: Great location, fine hotel
